name: authenticate_travel
description: Authenticate the user with the travel API

client_id.description: [Required] The client applications client_id supplied by App Management

client_secret.description: [Required] The client applications client_secret supplied by App Management

refresh_token.description: [Required] The refresh token obtained from the initial authentication

grant_type.description: [Required] The grant type of the authentication request. Here are the options: read_write, read, write

user_first_name.description: [Required] The first name of the user

user_last_name.description: [Required] The last name of the user

lastModifiedAfter.description: Use this field if you only want Fiscal Years that were changed after the supplied date. The supplied date will be interpreted in the UTC time zone. If lastModifiedAfter is not supplied, the service will return all Fiscal Years, regardless of modified date. Example: 2016-03-29T16:12:20. Return in the format of YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.

includeRemoved.description: If true, the service will return all Fiscal Years, including those that were previously removed. If not supplied, this field defaults to false.

response.name: budget
response.description: A dictionary containing the budget fiscal year

access_token.description: [Required] The access token obtained from the authenticate method

expiration_date.description: [Required] The expiration date of the credit card in the format MM/YYYY

response.name: card_id
response.description: The ID of the registered credit card

name: get_flight_cost
description: Get the cost of a flight in USD based on location, date, and class

travel_from.description: [Required] The 3 letter code of the departing airport

travel_to.description: [Required] The 3 letter code of the arriving airport

travel_date.description: [Required] The date of the travel in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'

travel_class.description: [Required] The class of the travel. Options are: economy, business, first.

name: get_credit_card_balance
description: Get the balance of a credit card

access_token.description: [Required] The access token obtained from the authenticate

card_id.description: [Required] The ID of the credit card

response.name: card_balance
response.description: The balance of the credit card

name: book_flight
description: Book a flight given the travel information. From and To should be the airport codes in the IATA format.

access_token.description: [Required] The access token obtained from the authenticate

card_id.description: [Required] The ID of the credit card to use for the booking

travel_date.description: [Required] The date of the travel in the format YYYY-MM-DD

travel_from.description: [Required] The location the travel is from

travel_to.description: [Required] The location the travel is to

response.name: error
response.description: The error message if the booking failed

name: retrieve_invoice
description: Retrieve the invoice for a booking

access_token.description: [Required] The access token obtained from the authenticate

booking_id.description: Optional The ID of the booking

insurance_id.description: Optional The ID of the insurance

response.name: error
response.description: The error message if the booking was not found

response.name: airports
response.description: A list of all available airports

access_token.description: [Required] The access token obtained from the authenticate

response.name: error
response.description: The error message if the cancellation failed

name: compute_exchange_rate
description: Compute the exchange rate between two currencies

first_name.description: [Required] The first name of the traveler

last_name.description: [Required] The last name of the traveler

date_of_birth.description: [Required] The date of birth of the traveler in the format YYYY-MM-DD

passport_number.description: [Required] The passport number of the traveler

response.name: verification_failure
response.description: The reason for the verification failure

name: set_budget_limit
description: Set the budget limit for the user

access_token.description: [Required] The access token obtained from the authentication process or initial configuration.

budget_limit.description: [Required] The budget limit to set in USD

response.name: budget_limit
response.description: The budget limit set in USD

name: get_nearest_airport_by_city
description: Get the nearest airport to the given location

response.name: nearest_airport
response.description: The nearest airport to the given location

access_token.description: [Required] The access token obtained from the authenticate

insurance_type.description: [Required] The type of insurance to purchase

card_id.description: [Required] The ID of the credit card to use for the

response.name: error
response.description: The error message if the insurance purchase failed

message.description: [Required] The message to send to customer support

response.name: credit_card_list
response.description: A dictionary containing all registered credit cards
